SELECT `user`.id, `user`.user_uuid, `user`.user_name, `user`.password, `user`.real_name, `user`.age, `user`.sex, `user`.birth_day, `user`.user_level, `user`.phone, `user`.status, `user`.image_path, `user`.create_time, sub_class.class_ids, sub.`name` AS subjectName, grade.`name` AS gradeName, sub_class.subject_id, sub_class.grade_id FROM v_user AS `user` LEFT JOIN v_user_role AS user_role ON `user`.id =user_role.user_id LEFT JOIN v_user_subject_class AS sub_class ON `user`.id =sub_class.user_id LEFT JOIN v_subject AS sub ON sub_class.subject_id =sub.id LEFT JOIN v_grade AS grade ON sub_class.grade_id =grade.id WHERE user.del_flag = '0'
AND `user`.user_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{query.userName},'%'))
AND sub_class.grade_id = #{query.gradeId}
AND user_role.role_id = #{query.roleId}
AND JSON_CONTAINS( sub_class.class_ids,CONVERT ( #{query.classId}, CHAR )) = 1
GROUP BY `user`.id
ORDER BY
create_time ASC create_time DESC

SELECT `user`.id, `user`.user_uuid, `user`.user_name, `user`.password, `user`.real_name, `user`.age, `user`.sex, `user`.birth_day, `user`.user_level, `user`.phone, `user`.status, `user`.image_path, `user`.create_time, sub_class.class_ids, sub_class.subject_id, sub_class.grade_id FROM v_user AS `user` LEFT JOIN v_user_subject_class AS sub_class ON `user`.id =sub_class.user_id WHERE user.del_flag = '0' AND `user`.id = #{userId}
